title: 【OOC】 TNT爆炸不破坏方块MOD 1.8
author: 新之助~
txt_content:
本帖最后由 新之助~ 于 2016-12-17 20:20 编辑 

介绍

==================================================

大家还为熊孩子用TNT破坏局域网而感到烦恼吗

只要你用了这个MOD一切OK

服务器也可以用

==================================================

作用

==================================================

TNT不会破坏地形 但是有伤害

==================================================

命令

==================================================================


/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-21 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~2 ~-12 ~6 {Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-12 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-11 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-10 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-9 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-8 ~8 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-7 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/kill @e[score_tnt_min=65]"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-6 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[score_tnt_min=65] ~ ~ ~ summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {ExplosionRadius:3,Fuse:0,CustomName:\\"TNT\\"}"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-5 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players add @e[type=PrimedTnt] tnt 1"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-4 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~-1 ~0 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-3 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~0 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~-2 ~6 ~3 ~-2 ~10 air 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~0 ~5 ~4 ~0 ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"say 欢迎使用TNT爆炸不破坏方块MOD"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule mobGriefing false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add tnt dummy"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~25 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码



==================================================================
原理
==================================================================
原理先创建一个计分板/scoreboard objectives add tnt dummy然后关闭生物破坏/gamerule mobGriefing false还有3条指令/scoreboard players add @e[type=PrimedTnt] tnt 1/execute @e[score_tnt_min=65] ~ ~ ~ summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {ExplosionRadius:3,Fuse:0,CustomName:"TNT"}/kill @e[score_tnt_min=65]先给一个点燃的TNT刷分刷到65的时候召唤一只爆炸时间为0的苦力怕最后删除TNT
==================================================================

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:

万一还没到达65就炸了怎么办233

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 新之助~
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2016-10-13 10:47
被爆炸激活的tnt不一定要80gt爆炸

replies.author: 新之助~
replies.txt_content:
MathBell 发表于 2016-10-13 17:37
不是呢，我是说如果存档设为和平，那么生成不出来苦力怕吧
有可能不会爆炸 但是不会有伤害 有可能有

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
新之助~ 发表于 2016-10-13 19:14
不会的 我是用正常的tnt爆炸时间来计算的
对啊 但是一旦TNT被爆炸点燃的话 它爆炸时间会短一些 这样 你的系统无法处理这种情况

而且 你三联了

replies.author: MathBell
replies.txt_content:
新之助~ 发表于 2016-10-13 19:11
是啊 为什么弄和平？？？？？
我的意思是说如果玩生存**调和平，就意味着tnt点燃后就会过一会儿消失，发挥不出来原来效果了
